title: The Adventure Zone: Dust Season 2 - Episode 3
description: On the night before the train leaves to Stitchton, the Graysons prepare themselves. Augustus starts a new business venture. Indrid has a premonition. Callan tries to stay on someone’s good side. Lulu makes a confession.
author: shows@themcelroy.family (Travis McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Clint McElroy, Erika Ishii)
content:encoded: On the night before the train leaves to Stitchton, the Graysons prepare themselves. Augustus starts a new business venture. Indrid has a premonition. Callan tries to stay on someone’s good side. Lulu makes a confession.
